function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consideration for virus transmission in interior spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting recommendations for people density in residential areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on automobiles and transportation costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for single-family houses due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Encouraging individual transportation over public transport","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and air quality in interior spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Middle density and intermediate housing in residential areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of respiratory diseases in indoor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of architectural and urban design on disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contradictory principles in urban planning and public health during pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between population density and epidemics of contagious diseases , tuberculosis, avian flu, covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited ability to collect geolocation data for studying disease transmission in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased vulnerability and higher fatality rates associated with contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of green spaces on infection risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between urban population density and pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of zoonotic diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inevitability of another influenza pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on human health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on contagious disease prevention in urban planning","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging infectious diseases due to environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on public health in urban development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on disease propagation in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on mixed-use zoning and community design for disease segregation and automobile-based traffic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on lighting and sunlight in building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene measures in urban environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population density and health correlation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tuberculosis mortality and housing density correlation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited methods to control bacterial pandemics before antibiotics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dedicated architectural programs for containment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of plagues on population","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of international strategy including new strains of pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of architecture and urbanism from pandemic mitigation strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on non-pharmaceutical interventions at the early stage of a actions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Electronic dissemination may lead to widespread adoption of unverified data and methodologies, leading to incorrect public health interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of coronavirus through social contact and movement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to comply with social distancing and hygiene measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misinformation measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in fear of the virus leading to reduced compliance with measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"}]}
